constituent: transmit, person, rising cloud, two, elbow, wall
heisigStory: Person . . . rising cloud. Hint: the Amerindians' smoke signal scan help provide a good image for this kanji, whose key word is meant to include transmissions of all sorts.
koohiiStory1: Mister T transmits a message with rising clouds (smoke) signals, to a nearby American Indian tribe. The smoke signals spell : "I p-i-t-y y-o-u f-o-o !".
koohiiStory2: Hanging one-handed under Cloud City, the Jedi-in-training Luke, uses the force to transmit his distress to Leia.
kunYomi: つた.わる、つた.える、つた.う、つだ.う、-づた.い、つて
myStory: chữ truyền. truyền đạt, truyền động. nhân + vân.
readingExamples: 伝う (つた.う), 伝える (つた.える), 伝わる (つた.わる)
words: ancestral, hereditary, imported, transmitted, handed down
be handed down, be introduced, be transmitted, be circulated, go along, walk along
